name: Kapiwara
description:
How to play ?
Move : WASD / Left stick
Attack : J
Roll : K

Kapiwara is a top-down action game featuring a lovely but fierce capybara, wandering through fields and caves with his trusty sword to defeat the monsters disturbing the peace of the forest.

The game is the first project of indie game developers Learning Cap, a group of longtime friends who are very passionate about the art form.
